name: enoa-client
description: The JavaScript client lets you use the ENOA on the frontend (browsers) or on the backend (Node.js) using multi adapters.

scripts.clean: git clean builds/ -f && git checkout builds/
scripts.release_patch: npm run clean && SET VERSION=PATCH&& npm run release
scripts.release_minor: npm run clean && SET VERSION=MINOR&& npm run release
scripts.release_major: npm run clean && SET VERSION=MAJOR&& npm run release

author: Nauman Ramzan ( nomi@emallates.com )
